title: BRIEF-Tsinghua Tongfang gets approval to issue 2.7 bln yuan medium-term notes
text:
BRIEF-Tsinghua Tongfang gets approval to issue 2.7 bln yuan medium-term notes Sept 21 
Sept 21 Tsinghua Tongfang Co Ltd 
* Says gets approval to issue 2.7 billion yuan ($424.02 million) medium-term notes 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1WcWWfY 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3676 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
